exchangeLuckyballComment: Mwawombola mfundo zanu kuti mupeze Mpira Wamwayi.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Mwagwiritsa ntchito Mpira Wamwayi kulowa mu Lucky Draw.
partnerMailContents1: Chonde onani zikalata zomwe zikufunika kuti zivomerezedwe ndi mnzanu ndikutumiza yankho ndi fayiloyo!
partnerMailContents3:
Chonde phatikizani chiphaso cha ID yanu kapena pasipoti
kuti mutsimikizire kuti mnzanuyo ndi ndani.
partnerMailContents5:
Chonde onani zikalata ndi zambiri zomwe zikufunika
kuti muvomerezedwe ndi anzanu ndipo titumizireni yankho!
partnerMailContents6: (Mtundu wa transaction, nambala yolowera, nambala ya akaunti, dzina loyamba la mwini akaunti, dzina lapakati, dzina lomaliza, nambala yafoni ya wolandila, ndi zina zambiri.)
partnerMailContents8:
Chonde titumizireni nambala yafoni komwe mungapezeke
kuyankhulana ndi mnzanu.
partnerMailContents9:
Chonde tumizani yankho lanu kudzera pa imelo kwa partner@buflexz.com .
Gulu la opareshoni likayang'ana yankho, kuwunika kwa anzawo ndi kuvomereza kudzakonzedwa.
authMailTitle: Zambiri za nambala yotsimikizika ya BUFLEXZ
authMailContents3: Kiyi yotsimikizira yaperekedwa kuti itsimikizire imelo.
authMailContents4:
Chonde lowetsani manambala 6 nambala yotsimikizira mwachindunji muzotsimikizira
zenera mkati mwa pulogalamuyi kapena koperani ndi kumata nambala yotsimikizira.
authMailContents5:
Imelo iyi ndi yotumiza kokha.
Mayankho sangathe, ndiye ngati muli ndi mafunso kapena zovuta,
chonde titumizireni kudzera pagulu lamakasitomala mkati mwa pulogalamu ya BUFLEXZ.
